I can't open the washing machine door.header: Click the button with the number of the washing machine three times and you will get 20 seconds for free. (You can turn this option on three times).
I can't open the washing machine door.question: Is the washing machine continuing the washing program?

yes.header: The washing machine has not finished the washing program. Buy more time.
yes.question: Did this solve the problem?

no.header: Turn on the washing machine and check if there is a red key icon on the washing machine display.
no.question: Is there a red key icon on the washing machine display?

yes.header: Wait a moment for the washing machine to unlock the door.
yes.question: Did this solve the problem?

no.header: Push the washing machine door with your right hand and pull the handle with your left hand.
no.question: Did you open the washing machine door?

no.header: Probably the handle is broken. Watch the video on how to open the door with a special emergency method.
Push the washing machine door with your right hand and pull the handle with your left hand.
no.question: Did you open the washing machine door?

no.header: Probably the handle is broken. Watch the video on how to open the door with a special emergency method.
